articles.title: Wayne Rooney is every inch the doting dad as he wears matching festive pyjamas with his four sons - Daily Mail

articles.title: Strictly's Dianne Buswell clears up Joe Sugg split rumours after flying abroad solo for Christmas - Chronicle Live
articles.description: The dancer jetted off to Australia to spend Christmas with her family while Joe stayed in the UK, sparking concern among fans that the Strictly couple had called it quits
articles.content:
Strictly Come Dancing star Dianne Buswell has put rumours to rest that she has split from boyfriend Joe Sugg after recent social media posts left fans concerned.
